backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Time type and a function that computes time-of-day seconds adjusted for timezone.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard measurement display rules tied to HeaderMeasurements.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file noting no external API keys are required.
frontend/CLEAN_REDEPLOY.md: Guide explaining steps for performing a clean rebuild and redeploy of the frontend app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Regression testing checklist covering layout, navigation, widgets, pages, and data persistence.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Shell script that deletes build artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, type-checks, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling onboarding gating and page navigation within a themed 720px canvas.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation component with five tabs and icon-based navigation state handling.
frontend/src/components/HeaderMeasuremen: Displays weekly and monthly measurement grids and collapses entirely when no data exists.
frontend/src/components/LiveCalendarWidg: Real-time greeting and date/time widget with a calendar button and second-by-second updates.
frontend/src/components/MeasurementsEdit: Dialog component for editing weekly and monthly body measurements with local drafts and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingGate.t: Onboarding screen that collects a user's name, validates it, and completes onboarding through the app store.
frontend/src/components/ParsedMealPrevie: Displays parsed meal items with calories, macros, and totals in a styled preview layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file noting that Zustand replaces backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useResultCountdowns.t: Hook that computes and updates weekly and monthly countdowns every minute based on user start time.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom theme variables defining neon color scheme and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/apiKey.ts: Empty placeholder file for API key handling.
frontend/src/lib/calories.ts: Provides MET‑based cardio calorie calculations and a fallback gym calorie formula using user profile constants.
frontend/src/lib/caloriesBurnedApi.ts: Empty placeholder file for calorie API logic.
frontend/src/lib/caloriesBurnedKey.ts: Empty placeholder file for calorie API key handling.
frontend/src/lib/countdowns.ts: Provides functions to compute remaining days in user-based weekly and monthly cycles with fallbacks when no start timestamp exists.
frontend/src/lib/descriptionFlow.ts: Parses a food description into items and enriches them with locally sourced nutrition data.
frontend/src/lib/indianNutrition.ts: Contains an Indian food nutrition database and logic to retrieve nutrition data via exact or partial matching.
frontend/src/lib/mealPromptParser.ts: Parses meal text into multiple food items by detecting quantities, units, and food names, converting them to gram estimates.
frontend/src/lib/mevsa.ts: Provides a general nutrition database with lookup logic plus partial exercise listings.
frontend/src/lib/nutrition.ts: Fetches nutrition data using Indian and Mevsa databases with a simple fallback estimator.
frontend/src/lib/portionEstimates.ts: Converts portions and units into gram estimates using defaults and food-specific overrides.
frontend/src/lib/store.ts: Defines Zustand store with persistent daily data, activity/food tracking, goals, streaks, and measurement state plus helper initializers.
frontend/src/lib/webSearchNutrition.ts: Empty placeholder file for nutrition web search logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing today’s stats including study, gym, nutrition, calories, goals, streak, and countdowns.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Displays daily goals with completion state and allows toggling goals and school attendance.
frontend/src/pages/Gym.tsx: Gym page for adding gym or cardio activities, calculating calories, and listing daily totals.
frontend/src/pages/Nutrition.tsx: Nutrition page for adding or auto‑fetching food entries and showing daily nutrition totals.
frontend/src/pages/Study.tsx: React page for managing daily study topics with add, update status, and delete actions using app store state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, existing features, and a pending request related to removing 'No data yet' labels.
